name: Suplecs (US) + Bong Voyage // Free Live
description:
SUPLECSüîª
Hailing from New Orleans and formed in 1996, Suplecs is a heavyweight stoner rock power trio featuring Danny Nick (ex-Eyehategod), Durel Yates, and Andrew Preen. With releases on Man‚Äôs Ruin and Small Stone Records, tours alongside Clutch, High On Fire, COC, and more, and a High Times ‚ÄúStoner Rock Band of the Year‚Äù win in 2011, Suplecs has been a staple of Southern heavy music for decades. 2025 marks the 25th anniversary of their legendary annual Mardi Gras show, and the band is currently finishing their long-awaited fifth album promising raw heaviness, hard-earned swagger, and classic Suplecs grit.
